text:
The Bilderberg Group operates as an annual conference, typically held in

Europe. Membership is by invitation only, with participants selected for their

expertise and influence in various fields (url website). The group's

membership has included prominent figures such as politicians (e.g., Angela

Merkel, Tony Blair), business leaders (e.g., Bill Gates, George Soros), and

intellectuals (e.g., Henry Kissinger, Joseph Stiglitz).

Criticisms and Controversies
